      private boolean customerHasOverlappingAppt() throws Exception
      Checks if customer has overlapping appointments.

      Uses lambda function to more easily iterate over an ObservableList where the contents of the objects within the list are needed without the need to define a new helper method

      Returns:
      the boolean if customer has overlapping appointments
      Throws:
      Exception - the exception
